title: New: Reverse People – We All
body:
Brooklyn duo **Reverse People** (Kristen Reilly and Brendan Walter) are effortlessly cool.

Debut single, _We All_ seemingly draws from 60’s psychedelic pop, not too far from Magical Mystery Tour in truth, through the obvious presence of killer melodies, yet littered with slightly off kilter, almost out of place, interventions. ‘please don’t ask me ’bout my mind / when I sleep I go through space and time’ bemoans Kristen Reilly, underpinned by a chorus of ‘ooo’s, it’s simultaneously foreboding and uplifting. Check out _We All_ below.
